sentences: Claudio Cecchetto (born 19 April 1952) is an Italian record producer and talent scout.
Cechetto was born in Ceggia, (metropolitan city of Venice).
Cecchetto was also a performer; his song "Gioca-Jouer" topped the Italian hit parade in 1981.
In the spring of 1992, he married Maria Paola Danna in Riccione.
They have two children, Jody Cecchetto (born in 1994) and Leonardo Cecchetto (born in 2000).
